bookreader-desc: BookReader is a tool to read PDF/DjVu in book format from wikimedia sites.
byurl-placeholder: Enter a URL of PDF/DjVu from Wikimedia project
filename-placeholder: Enter the name of the file
localfile-notice: Autocomplete of filename works only for locally uploaded files.
no-javascript: The BookReader requires JavaScript to be enabled. Please check that your browser supports JavaScript and that it is enabled in the browser settings.
embebed-not-supported: Embed code not supported in bookreader.
